mapper.insert: insert into sys_menu (menu_id, parent_id, menu_name, url, perms, type, icon, order_num, status, create_time, update_time, is_delete) values (#{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update sys_menu set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, menu_name = #{menuName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, perms = #{perms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=BIT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=BIT} where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select menu_id, parent_id, menu_name, url, perms, type, icon, order_num, status, create_time, update_time, is_delete from sys_menu where menu_id = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
